claim: H_CW does not imply H_R for generic coefficient pairs; failure persists even under first-tree-coefficient constraints

counterexamples.name: generic_lc_pair
counterexamples.notes: Found by scripts/bridge_counterexample_search.py; H_CW holds on 81-point log lambda grid, H_R fails.

counterexamples.name: tree_prefix_constrained_pair
counterexamples.notes: Found by random search with fixed tree-prefix constraints and LC; still gives H_CW true and H_R false on tested grid.
